abstract: Keeping Score column; Detroit Lions wide receiver Calvin Johnson, known for being bigger, strong and faster than any other player in his position or on field, will likely retire in his prime, offering another reminder of how brutal sport can be.

headline.print_headline: Bigger, Stronger, Faster and, Maybe Soon, Retired
headline.main: Calvin Johnson: Bigger, Stronger, Faster and, Maybe Soon, Retired

snippet: Johnson, who is reportedly planning to retire, would immediately enter the discussion as one of the best young players to walk away, with per-game numbers that put him in elite company.
